Package com.dpsframework.core.engines

Agent vs 'Expert-System Engines' connection classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RBEngine
    Generic Rule-Based Engine Object definition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsolePanelCLIPS
    This Class facilitates to call an Action type REPL (Read Eval Print Loop) over JTextArea Swing Component and it uses ConsoleRouterCLIPS like CLIPS output Router.
    ConsolePanelJESS
    It permits to call an Action REPL (Read Eval Print Loop) over JTextArea Swing Component from inside of Agents and it uses JESS-JTextArea-Router as JESS output Router.
    ConsoleRouterCLIPS
    Class for connecting CLIPS Router to Shell-Engine Console.
    ConsoleRouterJESS
    A special PrintWriter Object connected to ConsolePanelJESS.
    RBEngineCLIPS
    CLIPS Engine Prototype.
    RBEngineCLIPSRouter
    This is the old Router Class Definition in CLIPSJNI
    RBEngineJESS
    Prototype JESS Engine to Node-Agentes.
    RBEngineJESSRouter
    A special PrintWriter Object connected to RBEngineJESS.

Package com.dpsframework.core.engines Description

Agent vs 'Expert-System Engines' connection classes

.

Since:
2015, 2015, update at: 2018-08-24
Version:
1.7 (Build.1814)
Author:
Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)

Agent dpsFramework Project

+-------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| Node    Board  Monitor  Stage       |    The dpsFramework Agents Project |
|           __             ____       |                                    |
|     __   /  \           /    \      + -----------------------------------|
|  __/  \  \__/      __  /      \                                          |
| /  \__/  /  \   __/  \ \      /                                          |
| \__/     \__/  /  \__/  \____/   dpsFramework is a standard directory on |
| /  \     /  \  \__/            file-system generated to launch groups of |
| \__/     \__/              JADE Agents which they can run Expert Systems |
|                           Applications based on CLIPS or Jess Technology.|
